$WmMPID_リーフ,ch07_02_Leaf_M_Normal,Face|Lord Seliph is...a great man. I struggle
to believe there is but one year
difference in our ages.$k$p$WmMPID_アウグスト,ch07_17_August_M_Normal,Face|That is true, but you have grown as
well, my prince. In a year's time, you
may well be his equal.$k$p$Sbs1000|
